title: U.S. Annual Budget Deficit & Impeachment Inquiry
itunes:title: U.S. Annual Budget Deficit & Impeachment Inquiry
description:
Kevin spoke with Ryan Teague Beckwith, Bloomberg National Political Correspondent, Francesca Chambers, White House Correspondent for McClatchy, and Ben Bain, Bloomberg Financial Regulation reporter. They discussed the national deficit and the latest on the impeachment inquiry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
